marklogic.body:
Winning the lotto isn't Always sunshine and moonbeams. Anyone with a character flaw is likely to die. Alcoholic? Your odds of drinking yourself to death just increased 100x! Drug addict? Your probably going to OD! Gambling problem? Well lets just say you will probably be broke within 10 years.
If not that then all you gotta worry about is your wife/husband divorcing you or a relative trying to do you in for your money. Not to mention the constant Cold calls, scam artists, and every single person you ever knew or met asking for money.
